name: Not in charge
description:
Not in charge is my second ever published game on itch.io. I teamed up with my friend Louis Wahart to make this one as an university project, and we both hope you will have a great time playing it ! Most art made by myself.

Download it for free and don't hesitate to leave a comment. Feedback is highly appreciated.

Web version coming soon...

Key bindings :

  • Q/D : Move
  • Space : Jump
  • Left Shift : Dash
  • Mouse Click : Shoot

Music : LonePeakMusic

Art : Szadi Art
